intro: Myosotis diversifolia, commonly known as the variable forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is characterized by its delicate blue to purple flowers and oval-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors and stream banks. It belongs to the Boraginaceae family and is known for its ornamental value. Myosotis diversifolia is also valued for its ecological role in supporting local insect populations.
